channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Wai TONG's Personal Website

item.title: Vispie
item.description: VisPIE aims at promoting sustainability lifestyle using XR, digital twin, and data visualization. We present USTreePlantAR to encourage students to perform green action in the campus. This project won the Deloitte ESG Innovation Award in hackUST 2022.

item.title: Immersive Walk
item.description: Immersive Walk is an app that celebrate the HKUST 30th Anniversary by allowing students to go through the history of HKUST 30 years history in Augmented Reality.

item.title: Pulse of HKUST
item.description: Pulse of HKUST aims to promote a smart campus which supports effective and smart decision-makings through the combined power of IoT devices, big data, and AI. This project has received Student Innovation Gold Award in HKICT 2019 and Merit award in the R&D category in APICTA 2019.

item.title: USThing
item.description: USThing is a student-develop app that provide convenient access to commonly used HKUST systems and handy tools for enhancing students’ campus life.
